ARABIC: فَجَعَلْنَٰهَا نَكَٰلًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهَا وَمَا خَلْفَهَا وَمَوْعِظَةً لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We made it an exemplary punishment for those there then, and those coming afterwards, and a warning to those who have taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And whom We made an example for the people (of the day) and those after them, and warning for those who fear God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus We made their end a warning to the people of their time and succeeding generations, and an admonition for God-fearing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: in order to set up an example for their contemporaries and coming generations and to make it a reminder for the pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So We made this incident (of that town) a warning to the surrounding towns (others of their time) and to succeeding generations, and a lesson for the pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So We made this punishment an example for those in front of it and those behind it, and a lesson for Al-Muttaqin (the pious).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We made them an example to those who witnessed it and those who came after it, and an admonition to those who guard (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We made it a punishment exemplary for all the former times and for the latter, and an admonition to such as are godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We made it an example to their own and to succeeding generations, and an admonition to the Allah-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We made their fate an example to their own generation and to those who followed them and a lesson to those who fear God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We made it a deterrent unto those of their day and those after them, and an exhortation unto the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We made it an exemplary punishment for the present and the succeeding [generations], and an advice to the Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So We made it an example to their own time and to their posterity, and a lesson to those who fear Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So We made this punishment an example to their own and to succeeding generations and a lesson to those who are Al-Muttaqun (the pious - see V. 2:2).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We made it a punishment for the former times and for the latter, an exhortation to the cautious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus We made it a deterrent for their generation, and for subsequent generations, and a lesson for the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We made it a deterrent punishment for those who were present and those who succeeded [them] and a lesson for those who fear Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:66] And We made it, this punishment, an exemplary punishment, a lesson to dissuade others from doing what they did; for all the former times and for the latter, that is, for the people of that time or those that came later; and an admonition to such as who fear, God: these are singled out for mention here because they, in contrast to others, are the ones who benefit thereby.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We made it) turning them into apes (an example) we subjected them to a chastisement (to their own) for the sins they had committed before, (and) made them a lesson (to succeeding generations) in order that they do not follow their example (and admonition to the God-fearing) and a counsel and warning to those who fear Allah, i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) and his Companions.
